Sentencas: The authors developed a simulation program for a single cell of industrial-sized planar solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) with a scandia-ceria-stabilized-zirconia (10Sc1CeSZ) electrolyte fed with hydrogen fuel gas, to investigate its operating characteristics under fuel gas leakage conditions.
Titulo: Numerical investigation on the performance and detection of an industrial-sized planar solid oxide fuel cell with fuel gas leakage

Sentencas: Firstly, the numerical and corresponding experimental results were compared under conditions with no fuel gas leakage.
Titulo: Numerical investigation on the performance and detection of an industrial-sized planar solid oxide fuel cell with fuel gas leakage

Sentencas: The results confirmed the sufficient validity of the developed simulation program.
Titulo: Numerical investigation on the performance and detection of an industrial-sized planar solid oxide fuel cell with fuel gas leakage

Sentencas: Next, using the program, simulations involving fuel gas leakage on both sides of the SOFC were carried out.
Titulo: Numerical investigation on the performance and detection of an industrial-sized planar solid oxide fuel cell with fuel gas leakage

Sentencas: It was found that fuel gas leakage alters the stream of the fuel gas and induces a serious shortage of fuel gas in the downstream area of both side channels.
Titulo: Numerical investigation on the performance and detection of an industrial-sized planar solid oxide fuel cell with fuel gas leakage

Sentencas: This leads to a significant reduction in the local electromotive force and the appearance of regions where local electrolysis of water vapor occurs, in the downstream area on both sides.
Titulo: Numerical investigation on the performance and detection of an industrial-sized planar solid oxide fuel cell with fuel gas leakage

Sentencas: The effect of fuel gas leakage on the single cell voltage and the differential resistance was also investigated.
Titulo: Numerical investigation on the performance and detection of an industrial-sized planar solid oxide fuel cell with fuel gas leakage

Sentencas: It was revealed that the fuel gas leakage cannot be detected by only measuring the single cell voltage.
Titulo: Numerical investigation on the performance and detection of an industrial-sized planar solid oxide fuel cell with fuel gas leakage

Sentencas: On the other hand, the fuel gas leakage can be detected at an early stage, when only several percent of its inlet flow rate leaks, by measuring the differential resistance under a high fuel utilization rate condition of about 90 % and above.
Titulo: Numerical investigation on the performance and detection of an industrial-sized planar solid oxide fuel cell with fuel gas leakage

Sentencas: Based on this result, the authors proposed to employ the differential resistance, instead of the single cell voltage, as an evaluation index to detect the fuel gas leakage.
Titulo: Numerical investigation on the performance and detection of an industrial-sized planar solid oxide fuel cell with fuel gas leakage
